verses.text: \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w of|strong="G1909"\w* the things which we have \w spoken|strong="G3004"\w* \add this is\add* the \w sum|strong="G2774"\w*: We \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* an high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* is \w set|strong="G2523"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* the right \w hand|strong="G1188"\w* of the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* of the \w Majesty|strong="G3172"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w heavens|strong="G3772"\w*;

A \w minister|strong="G3011"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="G0039"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w the|strong="G4633"\w* \w true|strong="G0228"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="G4633"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w pitched|strong="G4078"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w* is \w ordained|strong="G2525"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w offer|strong="G4374"\w* \w gifts|strong="G1435"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="G2378"\w*: \w wherefore|strong="G3606"\w* \add it is\add* of \w necessity|strong="G0316"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* this \w man|strong="G5126"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w somewhat|strong="G5100"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* to \w offer|strong="G4374"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* he \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, he \w should|strong="G2258"\w* \w not|strong="G3761"\w* \w be|strong="G2258"\w* a \w priest|strong="G2409"\w*, seeing that there \w are|strong="G5607"\w* \w priests|strong="G2409"\w* that \w offer|strong="G4374"\w* \w gifts|strong="G1435"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* to the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3748"\w* \w serve|strong="G3000"\w* unto the \w example|strong="G5262"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w shadow|strong="G4639"\w* of heavenly \w things|strong="G2032"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* was admonished of \w God|strong="G5537"\w* when he was \w about|strong="G3195"\w* to \w make|strong="G2005"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="G4633"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w*, \w See|strong="G3708"\w*, saith \w he|strong="G5346"\w*, \add that\add* thou \w make|strong="G4160"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w pattern|strong="G5179"\w* \w shewed|strong="G1166"\w* to \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w mount|strong="G3735"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G3570"\w* hath he obtained \w a|strong="G5177"\w* more \w excellent|strong="G1313"\w* \w ministry|strong="G3009"\w*, by how \w much|strong="G3745"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* he \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w mediator|strong="G3316"\w* of a \w better|strong="G2909"\w* \w covenant|strong="G1242"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* was \w established|strong="G3549"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w better|strong="G2909"\w* \w promises|strong="G1860"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \add covenant\add* had \w been|strong="G2258"\w* \w faultless|strong="G0273"\w*, then should \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w* have been \w sought|strong="G2212"\w* for the \w second|strong="G1208"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* finding \w fault|strong="G3201"\w* with \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, the \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w*, \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w when|strong="G2532"\w* I will \w make|strong="G4931"\w* \w a|strong="G1242"\w* \w new|strong="G2537"\w* \w covenant|strong="G1242"\w* \w with|strong="G1909"\w* the \w house|strong="G3624"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G1909"\w* the \w house|strong="G3624"\w* of \w Judah|strong="G2448"\w*:

\w Not|strong="G3756"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w covenant|strong="G1242"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* I \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w with|strong="G3962"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w when|strong="G1949"\w* \w I|strong="G3450"\w* \w took|strong="G1949"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* by the \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* to \w lead|strong="G1806"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w out|strong="G1806"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w land|strong="G1093"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="G0125"\w*; \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w continued|strong="G1696"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w covenant|strong="G1242"\w*, and \w I|strong="G2504"\w* \w regarded|strong="G0272"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w not|strong="G0272"\w*, \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \add is\add* the \w covenant|strong="G1242"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* I will \w make|strong="G1303"\w* with the \w house|strong="G3624"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w those|strong="G1565"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*; I \w will|strong="G1924"\w* \w put|strong="G1325"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w laws|strong="G3551"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w mind|strong="G1271"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w write|strong="G1924"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I will \w be|strong="G2071"\w* to \w them|strong="G0846"\w* a \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* to \w me|strong="G3427"\w* a \w people|strong="G2992"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w shall|strong="G1321"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w teach|strong="G1321"\w* every \w man|strong="G1538"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w neighbour|strong="G4139"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* every \w man|strong="G1538"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Know|strong="G1097"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* shall \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*, \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w least|strong="G3398"\w* \w to|strong="G2193"\w* the \w greatest|strong="G3173"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* I will \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w merciful|strong="G2436"\w* \w to|strong="G0093"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w unrighteousness|strong="G0093"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w iniquities|strong="G0458"\w* will I \w remember|strong="G3415"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w more|strong="G2089"\w*.

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* that he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, A \w new|strong="G2537"\w* \add covenant\add*, he hath \w made|strong="G3822"\w* the \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w old|strong="G3822"\w*. \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* that which \w decayeth|strong="G3822"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* waxeth \w old|strong="G1095"\w* \add is\add* \w ready|strong="G1451"\w* to vanish \w away|strong="G0854"\w*.
